text: @senatemajldr @BretBaier Unserious describes a Senate Majority leader who, 4 months into the Coronavirus pandemic, does not even know that the Obama Administration developed and wrote a detailed and scientifically vetted pandemic response playbook and that the Trump Administration willfully ignored it.
